paragraphs.title: 01 Kafka Source
paragraphs.text:
%flink.sql
CREATE TABLE kafka_onprem_source (
  id STRING,
  event_ts TIMESTAMP(3),
  value DOUBLE,
  raw_json STRING,
  WATERMARK FOR event_ts AS event_ts - INTERVAL '5' SECOND
) WITH (
  'connector' = 'kafka',
  'topic' = 'topic_onprem_sales',
  'properties.bootstrap.servers' = 'kafka:9092',
  'format' = 'json'
);

paragraphs.title: 02 DQ Enrichment + Hash
paragraphs.text:
%flink.sql
CREATE VIEW dq_enriched AS
SELECT
  id,
  event_ts,
  value,
  SHA256(
    CONCAT_WS('|',
      COALESCE(id, 'NULL'),
      COALESCE(CAST(value AS STRING), 'NULL'),
      CAST(event_ts AS STRING)
    )
  ) AS record_hash,
  raw_json
FROM kafka_onprem_source;

paragraphs.title: 03 Rule Evaluation
paragraphs.text:
%flink.sql
CREATE VIEW dq_rules AS
SELECT *,
  CASE
    WHEN id IS NULL THEN 'FAIL_ID_NULL'
    WHEN value < 0 THEN 'FAIL_NEG_VALUE'
    WHEN event_ts IS NULL THEN 'FAIL_TS_NULL'
    ELSE 'PASS'
  END AS dq_status
FROM dq_enriched;

paragraphs.title: 04 Cassandra Sink (OnPrem)
paragraphs.text:
%flink.sql
CREATE TABLE cassandra_onprem_sink (
  id STRING,
  event_ts TIMESTAMP(3),
  value DOUBLE,
  record_hash STRING,
  PRIMARY KEY (id) NOT ENFORCED
) WITH (
  'connector' = 'cassandra',
  'keyspace' = 'sales',
  'table' = 'events',
  'hosts' = '10.10.0.5,10.10.0.6',
  'datacenter' = 'DC_ONPREM'
);

paragraphs.title: 05 Insert Valid Rows
paragraphs.text:
%flink.sql
INSERT INTO cassandra_onprem_sink
SELECT id, event_ts, value, record_hash
FROM dq_rules
WHERE dq_status = 'PASS';

paragraphs.title: 06 Valid Row Counter
paragraphs.text:
%flink.sql
INSERT INTO dq_valid_metrics
SELECT
  'flink_onprem_job' AS job_name,
  TUMBLE_END(event_ts, INTERVAL '1' MINUTE) AS metric_ts,
  COUNT(*) AS valid_count
FROM dq_rules
WHERE dq_status = 'PASS'
GROUP BY TUMBLE(event_ts, INTERVAL '1' MINUTE);

paragraphs.title: 07 Invalid Row Counter
paragraphs.text:
%flink.sql
INSERT INTO dq_invalid_metrics
SELECT
  'flink_onprem_job' AS job_name,
  TUMBLE_END(event_ts, INTERVAL '1' MINUTE) AS metric_ts,
  COUNT(*) AS invalid_count
FROM dq_rules
WHERE dq_status <> 'PASS'
GROUP BY TUMBLE(event_ts, INTERVAL '1' MINUTE);
